questions.question: Hi! What can you do?
questions.answer: Hello! I can provide you with information about the AIDS (Artificial Intelligence and Data Science) department at K S Rangasamy College of Technology. Feel free to ask any questions!

questions.question: What is the AI&DS department about?
questions.answer: The AI&DS department, established in 2020, focuses on training students and conducting research in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Data Science, with a B.Tech program that emphasizes practical learning in state-of-the-art labs​

questions.question: What does the Artificial Intelligence and Data Science department focus on?
questions.answer: The AI&DS department, established in 2020, focuses on training students and conducting research in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Data Science, with a B.Tech program that emphasizes practical learning in state-of-the-art labs​

questions.question: What does the AI&DS department specialize in?
questions.answer: The department specializes in AI and Data Science, preparing students for careers through a 4-year B.Tech program, hands-on projects, and research initiatives

questions.question: What does the department focus on in terms of student education and training?
questions.answer: The department specializes in AI and Data Science, preparing students for careers through a 4-year B.Tech program, hands-on projects, and research initiatives

questions.answer: The department specializes in AI and Data Science, preparing students for careers through a 4-year B.Tech program, hands-on projects, and research initiatives

questions.question: how many classrooms,AI&DS classrooms,department classrooms
questions.answer: There are 4 classrooms in the AI & DS department, one for each year—1st, 2nd, 3rd, and 4th year students.

questions.question: AI&DS clubs or associations
questions.answer: Yes, there are several exclusive clubs and associations for AI & DS students. These include the Artificix Association, the Coders Club, and the newly organized Developer Club, all of which provide great platforms for skill development and collaboration.

questions.question: What job roles are available for AI & Data Science graduates right now?
questions.answer: In 2024, jobs in AI and Data Science include machine learning engineers, AI researchers, NLP engineers, and AI content editors. These roles involve developing AI models, working with big data, and solving real-world problems with AI. Top companies like Google, Meta, and Microsoft are actively hiring

questions.question: faculty names,staffs,teachers,faculty members
questions.answer: The faculty of the AI & DS department includes Dr. E. Mohanraj (Head of the Department), Dr. S. Sarumathi (Professor),Mr. N. Giridharan (Assistant Professor), Mrs. S. Gayathri (Assistant Professor), Mr. S. Raja (Assistant Professor), Mrs. I. Kalaimani (Assistant Professor), Mrs. P. Indhumathi (Assistant Professor), and Mrs. S. Sripriya (Assistant Professor).

questions.question: staffs

questions.question: faculty members
questions.answer: The faculty of the AI & DS department includes Dr. E. Mohanraj (Head of the Department), Dr. S. Sarumathi (Professor), Mr. N. Giridharan (Assistant Professor), Mrs. S. Gayathri (Assistant Professor), Mr. S. Raja (Assistant Professor), Mrs. I. Kalaimani (Assistant Professor), Mrs. P. Indhumathi (Assistant Professor), and Mrs. S. Sripriya (Assistant Professor).

questions.question: Sarumathi,Data Mining,Data Science
questions.answer: Dr. S. Sarumathi is a Professor specializing in Data Mining, Data Science, IoT, and Networking, with over 25 years of teaching experience. Her email is sarumathi@ksrct.ac.in.

questions.question: sarumathi
questions.answer: Dr. S. Sarumathi is a Professor specializing in Data Mining, Data Science, IoT, and Networking, with over 25 years of teaching experience. Her email is sarumathi@ksrct.ac.in.

questions.question: gayathri
questions.answer: Mrs. S. Gayathri, also an Assistant Professor, specializes in Cloud Computing and has 4 years of teaching experience. Her email is gayathris@ksrct.ac.in.

questions.question: kalaimani
questions.answer: Mrs. I. Kalaimani is an Assistant Professor specializing in Programming and Data Science, bringing over 16 years of teaching experience, and her email is kalaimani@ksrct.ac.in.

questions.question: indhu
questions.answer: Mrs. P. Indhumathi specializes in Networking, Python, and IoT, with 1.11 years of teaching experience; she can be reached at indhumathip@ksrct.ac.in.

questions.question: sripriya
questions.answer: Mrs. S. Sripriya, an Assistant Professor, specializes in JAVA, Software Testing, Web Development, and Data Mining, with 1.9 years of teaching experience. Her email is sripriya@ksrct.ac.in.

questions.question: raja
questions.answer: Mr. S. Raja, another Assistant Professor, focuses on Data Mining and Computer Networking, with 2 years of teaching experience; he can be contacted at rajas@ksrct.ac.in.

questions.question: giridharan
questions.answer: Mr. N. Giridharan is an Assistant Professor with expertise in Blockchain, Automation, and IoT, boasting over 8 years of teaching experience; he can be reached at giridharan@ksrct.ac.in.

questions.question: giri
questions.answer: Mr. N. Giridharan is an Assistant Professor with expertise in Blockchain, Automation, and IoT, boasting over 8 years of teaching experience; he can be reached at giridharan@ksrct.ac.in.
